name: LEIRUI 80Gbps for Thunderbolt 5 Cable 8K@60Hz 4K@540Hz/144Hz USB C to USB C Monitor Video Display Cable 240W PD Fast Charging USB4 V2 Cable for iPhone 15 Thunderbolt 4 Docking eGPU MacBook (1 FT)
description: Full functions USB C to USB C Cable: Compatible with Thunderbolt 5 cable is leveraging the latest USB4 V2, DisplayPort 2.1 and PCI Express Gen 4 standards to boost performance while maintaining outstanding simplicity and reliability. Full for all Thunderbolt 4, USB4 devices, while also being fully backward compatible with USB 2.0 / 3.0, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Gen 2 / USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 and Thunderbolt 3 devices     80Gbps High Speed USB-C Data Cable: Built on USB-IF standards, USB4 V2 cable compatible with Thunderbolt 5 cable It will deliver 80 Gbps of bi-directional bandwidth, and with Bandwidth Boost it will provide up to 120 Gbps for the best display experience, providing outstanding display and data connections. USB C Thunderbolt 5 cable will meet the high bandwidth needs of content creators and gamers     Dual 8K or 6K USB-C Video Monitor Cable: UHD 8K crystal-clear USB C display cable for content creators, gamers and professionals. Support a 4k@540Hz high-resolution displays and low-latency visuals while working with increasingly larger video and data files. Also support dual 8K/6K@60Hz or triple 4K@144Hz displays.This provides up to 3x more video bandwidth than Thunderbolt 4, and up to 50% more video bandwidth than DisplayPort 2.1 (UHBR20)     240W PD Fast Charging USB-C to USB-C Cable: USB4 V2 cable compatible with Thunderbolt 5 support delivering up to 240W(48V/5A) of power. USB Power Delivery 3.1 enables quick charging of even the most demanding notebooks. Backward compatible with 100W, 140W, 180W in Extended Power Range(EPR). It is ready to provide you with enough power at any time. Equipped E-Marker chip for safety, stability, and battery protection. Support PD 3.1, QC 4.0, FCP, AFC fast charging technology     Wide Compatibility: Full for Thunderbolt 5/4/3, USB-C devices. It is perfectly suited for iPhone 15 Pro/15 Pro Max, 2016+ MacBook Pro, 2017+ Mac, 2017+ Mac Pro, 2020+ M1 MacBook Air, Surface Pro 7/8/9, Windows laptops and PCs, docking stations, external SSD, hard drives, eGPU, ChromeBook and more. [Lifetime Warranty] We’re so confident in our cables. Not for half a year, not for 18 months, but for an entire lifetime
